body:
This was reported to me via the STAT github repo (https://github.com/LLNL/STAT/issues/27). STAT is failing to install because binutils variants aren't being concretized properly. I can work around this by depending on `^binutils+plugins`, but it seems like the default should work. Is there some other way I need to resolve this in the STAT package or LLVM package?

title: Installation issue: concretization of stat with binutils plugins variant
